title: EKKO Fan Art! I wanted to share my creation!

embed.description: Omg I finally finished him! This glorious man is Ekko T.T I love him so much that I drew for so many hours just to finish him! Hes a character from League of Legends that I am going to master no ma...

body: So as soon as I saw Ekko I wanted to draw him and overall play him no matter his role! He just seems like such an amazing Champion to be and I await eagerly for his arrival! He just has to stop rewinding time so much >.> making me wait too long!!!! lol anyways let me know what you all think! I love the feedback and your support!!!!!

replies.body: Holy crap, I can't believe you did this already. It's really good
Tyty! Yeah I kinda went fangirl crazy xD

I totally understand what you mean!  You've done a great job on him - totally aced the attitude from the video too :D

I have been itching to make the time-device-thingie from his back ever since I saw the concepts, but I couldn't make a peep about it until he was revealed!  I get a bit excitable.

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=eEriVfYA,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-11T20:12:13.562+0000)
>
> I totally understand what you mean!  You've done a great job on him - totally aced the attitude from the video too :D
> 
> I have been itching to make the time-device-thingie from his back ever since I saw the concepts, but I couldn't make a peep about it until he was revealed!  I get a bit excitable.

Any word on what his gameplay will be like?

I'm afraid I don't work directly on the League team, and haven't had a chance to give him a playtest yet, either.  Even if I had - giving out hints before the people who've been working on him would be all kinds of mean - like spoiling someone else's surprise party.  For the most part, though - I will likely be waiting until he pops up on PBE to find out!
Kinda like how {{champion:16}}  {{champion:267}}  {{champion:75}}  And {{champion:77}}  Ruined {{champion:32}} Surprise party...... {{champion:9}} didn't even show up :(

Too soon, Killstrado.  Too soon.
{{item:3070}}
Well it's {{champion:201}}  birthday, I'm sure he'd love to have {{champion:32}}  over  :D

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=eEriVfYA,comment-id=00000000000000010000,timestamp=2015-05-12T16:00:34.902+0000)
>
> I'm afraid I don't work directly on the League team, and haven't had a chance to give him a playtest yet, either.  Even if I had - giving out hints before the people who've been working on him would be all kinds of mean - like spoiling someone else's surprise party.  For the most part, though - I will likely be waiting until he pops up on PBE to find out!

You don't work on the League team? So are you like outsourcing? Or do you do this voluntarily?
I'm a full-time Rioter, at the Riot LA office, but there's more going on over here than just working directly on League itself :)
SSSSSH, don' t tell anyone or the Luminescence-cave will be discovered by the villains!

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=eEriVfYA,comment-id=0000000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-12T18:45:38.466+0000)
>
> I'm a full-time Rioter, at the Riot LA office, but there's more going on over here than just working directly on League itself :)

Ooooh and what might that be? I know your work is TIME consuming ;) lol
I know she did the map of shurima for Rek'Sai
Oh I should've assumed that duh. Thanks for the clarification. I hope I didn't take up too much of your TIME. ;)
Lol yaay for making amazing creations! Man I wish I could work with Riot and see all the goodies first hand!!!! Ty for the feedback as well means a lot to me!!

At the League of Legends War Veteran's Pub while the news about the new up and coming champion, Ekko, is broken to the world....

{{champion:79}} : So heyah {{champion:92}} !...lemme buy ya a drink!  I congratulate ya on the good news!

{{champion:92}} :  I'm sorry, do I know you?

{{champion:79}} :  Oh yeah...we go way back ya know...ya must have forgotten already *belly chuckles*

{{champion:92}} :  Wait...what?...forgotten what?

{{champion:79}} :  Yeah...well, *ahem* ya must've been really smashed that night I told ya...but, ya, I'm yur POPS!!!

{{champion:92}} :  EW! What!?  Ewww!...I mean, no..no...there's no way you're my father.

{{champion:79}} :  Oh...sure I am.  Your motha was a great general of Noxus.  We met at a night club when I was a young dashing bar fly *burrrp*.

{{champion:92}} :  Wait...you knew...my mom?!  Ha! You must be lying!  My mother died after betraying a Noxian prince.  Nice try getting in these pants you big pervert!...you had no chance to begin with anyways...ewl...*turns head away in disgust*

{{champion:79}} : (In soft voice with super thick Scottish accent) No...I'm serious.  I asked her out and shea said shea would only sleep wit me if I could beat her in a drianking game.  So I won, but then shea changed the rules...
*mumbles* crafty noxus vixen...
*ahem* anyways, shea said if I could beat her boyfriend in a duel shea would quit the army as well and move in with me.  He had no chance at all! Didn't know what hit him HAHAHA!..though, he did have a pretty big sword that he didn't get a chance ta use cuz he was laughing so hard...what was it called...the..uh...masa...uh...maser....uh....masermooner!  That's it.  Masermooner!!!

{{champion:92}} :  Wait. How do you know about the...No....no...Oh. My. God.  This cannot be happening. *takes a drink*...*takes another drink*...ewwwl.....

{{champion:79}} :   Relax daddy's dearest. Well, the good news is your mother isn't dead.  Shea made up the story about her death after shea gave birth to you.  Shea went to some temple or something to worship the moon and what all.  Boy..did shea have the eyes dat glowed like the moon itself after dat night...{{champion:131}} ...oh *burp*...ya know she still goes out and takes her anger about dat lost bet out on folks. 
Yeah...so err...anyways....congratulations again.  I'll come back another time when you're ready to talk some more sweet child of mine.

{{champion:92}} :  _*Shakes off the temporary horror and depression*_ Hold on!  Congratulations?!  Wait...what are you congratulating me for?

{{champion:79}} :  Ya don'ta know!?  Well, I guess ya really were smashed that night.  The night I first told ya about me being your pops, ya got so smashed and hooked up wit some drunk black dude that night...what was his name...oh yeah...dat {{champion:236}} ...handsome devil he is...anyways...he lost his wife and was down on his luck and you had this affectionate need and...

{{champion:92}} : ....... _*surprised and horrified at the same time*_

{{champion:79}} :  well..ya remember dat son you gave up to adoption a few yars back?  Dat's that ekko kid there on da TV.  I've been having my best bud Jax training him on the side.  I'm proud of me grandson!!!  You should be proud of your son too!

{{champion:92}} : *mumbles to self*...So..that's who the dad was... _*grabs a bottle of hard liquor and swigs half of it down*_....F.M.L.  _*passes out* *head hits bar*_

{{champion:79}}  _leaves_

{{champion:236}} :  _Swoops in with relentless pursuit_  Heyya.  I heard you met your dad again...boy...that was a fun night!

{{champion:92}} :  Wellph...atu..leuesstu  yua rememberedbbss..somthinga...._hiccup!_
he looks kinda older
New desktop background. Also plan on maining ekko when he comes out regardless of his role or power level.
^.^ Thanks for enjoying it so much that you wanna see it everyday!!! I agree too I really want to make him a main!!! :D
Finally a second black champion lets just hope his first skin doesnt make him look white like they did to {{champion:236}}
Yeah it does make me wonder what they have planed for a second skin let's give them hope!!!

Jeez you guys are quick.

I wish I was more motivated as an artist.
Lol yeah for some reason lately I have been art crazy and just been drawing up a lot of things. I guess I'm out of my rut :P
is it just me or does it look like some 1 blew their load on ekko "fresh"
